TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Encoder extends System.Object

summary.span: 对象封装一个全局唯一标识符 (GUID)，它标识图像编码器参数的类别。

span.span: An object encapsulates a globally unique identifier (GUID) that identifies the category of an image encoder parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 向图像编码器传递参数时，该参数将封装在 对象中。When you pass a parameter to an image encoder, the parameter is encapsulated in an object. 对象的一个字段是 GUID，用于指定参数的类别。One of the fields of the object is a GUID that specifies the category of the parameter. 使用 类的静态字段来检索包含所需类别的参数 。Use the static fields of the class to retrieve an that contains parameters of the desired category. 内置于中的图像编码器将接收属于多个类别的参数 [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]。The image encoders that are built into [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] receive parameters that belong to several categories. 下表列出了所有类别以及与每个类别关联的 GUID。The following table lists all the categories and the GUID associated with each category. f2e455dc-09b3-4316-8260-676ada32481c f2e455dc-09b3-4316-8260-676ada32481c 66087055-ad66-4c7c-9a18-38a2310b8337 66087055-ad66-4c7c-9a18-38a2310b8337 e09d739d-ccd4-44ee-8eba-3fbf8be4fc58 e09d739d-ccd4-44ee-8eba-3fbf8be4fc58 edb33bce-0266-4a77-b904-27216099e717 edb33bce-0266-4a77-b904-27216099e717 1d5be4b5-fa4a-452d-9cdd-5db35105e7eb 1d5be4b5-fa4a-452d-9cdd-5db35105e7eb 6d42c53a-229a-4825-8bb7-5c99e2b9a8b8 6d42c53a-229a-4825-8bb7-5c99e2b9a8b8 292266fc-ac40-47bf-8cfc-a85b89a655de 292266fc-ac40-47bf-8cfc-a85b89a655de 3a4e2661-3109-4e56-8536-42c156e7dcfa 3a4e2661-3109-4e56-8536-42c156e7dcfa 8d0eb2d1-a58e-4ea8-aa14-108074b7b6f9 8d0eb2d1-a58e-4ea8-aa14-108074b7b6f9 24d18c76-814a-41a4-bf53-1c219cccf797 24d18c76-814a-41a4-bf53-1c219cccf797

span.span: A globally unique identifier that identifies an image encoder parameter category.

summary.span: 根据指定的全局唯一标识符 (GUID) 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class from the specified globally unique identifier (GUID).

summary.span: 此 GUID 指定图像编码器参数类别。

span.span: The GUID specifies an image encoder parameter category.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 内置于中的图像编码器将接收属于多个类别的参数 [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]。The image encoders that are built into [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] receive parameters that belong to several categories. 下表列出了所有类别以及与每个类别关联的 GUID。The following table lists all the categories and the GUID associated with each category. f2e455dc-09b3-4316-8260-676ada32481c f2e455dc-09b3-4316-8260-676ada32481c 66087055-ad66-4c7c-9a18-38a2310b8337 66087055-ad66-4c7c-9a18-38a2310b8337 e09d739d-ccd4-44ee-8eba-3fbf8be4fc58 e09d739d-ccd4-44ee-8eba-3fbf8be4fc58 edb33bce-0266-4a77-b904-27216099e717 edb33bce-0266-4a77-b904-27216099e717 1d5be4b5-fa4a-452d-9cdd-5db35105e7eb 1d5be4b5-fa4a-452d-9cdd-5db35105e7eb 6d42c53a-229a-4825-8bb7-5c99e2b9a8b8 6d42c53a-229a-4825-8bb7-5c99e2b9a8b8 292266fc-ac40-47bf-8cfc-a85b89a655de 292266fc-ac40-47bf-8cfc-a85b89a655de 3a4e2661-3109-4e56-8536-42c156e7dcfa 3a4e2661-3109-4e56-8536-42c156e7dcfa 8d0eb2d1-a58e-4ea8-aa14-108074b7b6f9 8d0eb2d1-a58e-4ea8-aa14-108074b7b6f9 24d18c76-814a-41a4-bf53-1c219cccf797 24d18c76-814a-41a4-bf53-1c219cccf797

Public Shared ReadOnly ChrominanceTable As Encoder

summary.span: 用色度表参数类别的全局唯一标识符初始化的 对象。

span.span: An object that is initialized with the globally unique identifier for the chrominance table parameter category.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 向图像编码器传递参数时，该参数将封装在 对象中。When you pass a parameter to an image encoder, the parameter is encapsulated in an object. 对象的一个字段是 GUID，用于指定参数的类别。One of the fields of the object is a GUID that specifies the category of the parameter. 使用 类的静态字段来检索包含所需类别的参数 。Use the static fields of the class to retrieve an that contains parameters of the desired category. 内置于中的图像编码器将接收属于多个类别的参数 [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]。The image encoders that are built into [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] receive parameters that belong to several categories. 下表列出了所有类别以及与每个类别关联的 GUID。The following table lists all the categories and the GUID associated with each category. f2e455dc-09b3-4316-8260-676ada32481c f2e455dc-09b3-4316-8260-676ada32481c 66087055-ad66-4c7c-9a18-38a2310b8337 66087055-ad66-4c7c-9a18-38a2310b8337 e09d739d-ccd4-44ee-8eba-3fbf8be4fc58 e09d739d-ccd4-44ee-8eba-3fbf8be4fc58 edb33bce-0266-4a77-b904-27216099e717 edb33bce-0266-4a77-b904-27216099e717 1d5be4b5-fa4a-452d-9cdd-5db35105e7eb 1d5be4b5-fa4a-452d-9cdd-5db35105e7eb 6d42c53a-229a-4825-8bb7-5c99e2b9a8b8 6d42c53a-229a-4825-8bb7-5c99e2b9a8b8 292266fc-ac40-47bf-8cfc-a85b89a655de 292266fc-ac40-47bf-8cfc-a85b89a655de 3a4e2661-3109-4e56-8536-42c156e7dcfa 3a4e2661-3109-4e56-8536-42c156e7dcfa 8d0eb2d1-a58e-4ea8-aa14-108074b7b6f9 8d0eb2d1-a58e-4ea8-aa14-108074b7b6f9 24d18c76-814a-41a4-bf53-1c219cccf797 24d18c76-814a-41a4-bf53-1c219cccf797

Public Shared ReadOnly ColorDepth As Encoder

summary.span: 用颜色深度参数类别的全局唯一标识符初始化的 对象。

span.span: An object that is initialized with the globally unique identifier for the color depth parameter category.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 向图像编码器传递参数时，该参数将封装在 对象中。When you pass a parameter to an image encoder, the parameter is encapsulated in an object. 对象的一个字段是 GUID，用于指定参数的类别。One of the fields of the object is a GUID that specifies the category of the parameter. 使用 类的静态字段来检索包含所需类别的参数 。Use the static fields of the class to retrieve an that contains parameters of the desired category. 内置于中的图像编码器将接收属于多个类别的参数 [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]。The image encoders that are built into [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] receive parameters that belong to several categories. 下表列出了所有类别以及与每个类别关联的 GUID。The following table lists all the categories and the GUID associated with each category. f2e455dc-09b3-4316-8260-676ada32481c f2e455dc-09b3-4316-8260-676ada32481c 66087055-ad66-4c7c-9a18-38a2310b8337 66087055-ad66-4c7c-9a18-38a2310b8337 e09d739d-ccd4-44ee-8eba-3fbf8be4fc58 e09d739d-ccd4-44ee-8eba-3fbf8be4fc58 edb33bce-0266-4a77-b904-27216099e717 edb33bce-0266-4a77-b904-27216099e717 1d5be4b5-fa4a-452d-9cdd-5db35105e7eb 1d5be4b5-fa4a-452d-9cdd-5db35105e7eb 6d42c53a-229a-4825-8bb7-5c99e2b9a8b8 6d42c53a-229a-4825-8bb7-5c99e2b9a8b8 292266fc-ac40-47bf-8cfc-a85b89a655de 292266fc-ac40-47bf-8cfc-a85b89a655de 3a4e2661-3109-4e56-8536-42c156e7dcfa 3a4e2661-3109-4e56-8536-42c156e7dcfa 8d0eb2d1-a58e-4ea8-aa14-108074b7b6f9 8d0eb2d1-a58e-4ea8-aa14-108074b7b6f9 24d18c76-814a-41a4-bf53-1c219cccf797 24d18c76-814a-41a4-bf53-1c219cccf797 ## Examples 下面的示例从 BMP 文件创建一个 对象。The following example creates a object from a BMP file. 该代码将图像保存为颜色深度为每像素24位的 TIFF 文件。The code saves the image as a TIFF file that has a color depth of 24 bits per pixel. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Imaging.ClassicEncoderExample1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Imaging.ClassicEncoderExample1/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Imaging.ClassicEncoderExample1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Imaging.ClassicEncoderExample1/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Imaging.ClassicEncoderExample1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Imaging.ClassicEncoderExample1/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 向图像编码器传递参数时，该参数将封装在 对象中。When you pass a parameter to an image encoder, the parameter is encapsulated in an object. 对象的一个字段是 GUID，用于指定参数的类别。One of the fields of the object is a GUID that specifies the category of the parameter. 使用 类的静态字段来检索包含所需类别的参数 。Use the static fields of the class to retrieve an that contains parameters of the desired category. 内置于中的图像编码器将接收属于多个类别的参数 [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]。The image encoders that are built into [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] receive parameters that belong to several categories. 下表列出了所有类别以及与每个类别关联的 GUID。The following table lists all the categories and the GUID associated with each category. f2e455dc-09b3-4316-8260-676ada32481c f2e455dc-09b3-4316-8260-676ada32481c 66087055-ad66-4c7c-9a18-38a2310b8337 66087055-ad66-4c7c-9a18-38a2310b8337 e09d739d-ccd4-44ee-8eba-3fbf8be4fc58 e09d739d-ccd4-44ee-8eba-3fbf8be4fc58 edb33bce-0266-4a77-b904-27216099e717 edb33bce-0266-4a77-b904-27216099e717 1d5be4b5-fa4a-452d-9cdd-5db35105e7eb 1d5be4b5-fa4a-452d-9cdd-5db35105e7eb 6d42c53a-229a-4825-8bb7-5c99e2b9a8b8 6d42c53a-229a-4825-8bb7-5c99e2b9a8b8 292266fc-ac40-47bf-8cfc-a85b89a655de 292266fc-ac40-47bf-8cfc-a85b89a655de 3a4e2661-3109-4e56-8536-42c156e7dcfa 3a4e2661-3109-4e56-8536-42c156e7dcfa 8d0eb2d1-a58e-4ea8-aa14-108074b7b6f9 8d0eb2d1-a58e-4ea8-aa14-108074b7b6f9 24d18c76-814a-41a4-bf53-1c219cccf797 24d18c76-814a-41a4-bf53-1c219cccf797

remarks.format: ## Remarks 向图像编码器传递参数时，该参数将封装在 对象中。When you pass a parameter to an image encoder, the parameter is encapsulated in an object. 对象的一个字段是 GUID，用于指定参数的类别。One of the fields of the object is a GUID that specifies the category of the parameter. 使用 类的静态字段来检索包含所需类别的参数 。Use the static fields of the class to retrieve an that contains parameters of the desired category. 内置于中的图像编码器将接收属于多个类别的参数 [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]。The image encoders that are built into [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] receive parameters that belong to several categories. 下表列出了所有类别以及与每个类别关联的 GUID。The following table lists all the categories and the GUID associated with each category. f2e455dc-09b3-4316-8260-676ada32481c f2e455dc-09b3-4316-8260-676ada32481c 66087055-ad66-4c7c-9a18-38a2310b8337 66087055-ad66-4c7c-9a18-38a2310b8337 e09d739d-ccd4-44ee-8eba-3fbf8be4fc58 e09d739d-ccd4-44ee-8eba-3fbf8be4fc58 edb33bce-0266-4a77-b904-27216099e717 edb33bce-0266-4a77-b904-27216099e717 1d5be4b5-fa4a-452d-9cdd-5db35105e7eb 1d5be4b5-fa4a-452d-9cdd-5db35105e7eb 6d42c53a-229a-4825-8bb7-5c99e2b9a8b8 6d42c53a-229a-4825-8bb7-5c99e2b9a8b8 292266fc-ac40-47bf-8cfc-a85b89a655de 292266fc-ac40-47bf-8cfc-a85b89a655de 3a4e2661-3109-4e56-8536-42c156e7dcfa 3a4e2661-3109-4e56-8536-42c156e7dcfa 8d0eb2d1-a58e-4ea8-aa14-108074b7b6f9 8d0eb2d1-a58e-4ea8-aa14-108074b7b6f9 24d18c76-814a-41a4-bf53-1c219cccf797 24d18c76-814a-41a4-bf53-1c219cccf797

span.span: Using Image Encoders and Decoders in Managed GDI+

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Drawing.Imaging.Encoder Quality
Public Shared ReadOnly Quality As Encoder

summary.span: 获取使用质量参数类别的全局唯一标识符初始化的 对象。

span.span: Gets an object that is initialized with the globally unique identifier for the quality parameter category.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类别指定映像的压缩级别。The category specifies the level of compression for an image. 用于构造 时，质量类别的有用值范围是从0到100。When used to construct an , the range of useful values for the quality category is from 0 to 100. 指定的数字越小，压缩就越高，因此图像的质量越低。The lower the number specified, the higher the compression and therefore the lower the quality of the image. 零会向你显示最高质量的映像和100。Zero would give you the lowest quality image and 100 the highest. 向图像编码器传递参数时，该参数将封装在 对象中。When you pass a parameter to an image encoder, the parameter is encapsulated in an object. 对象的一个字段是 GUID，用于指定参数的类别。One of the fields of the object is a GUID that specifies the category of the parameter. 使用 类的静态字段来检索包含所需类别的参数 。Use the static fields of the class to retrieve an that contains parameters of the desired category. 内置于中的图像编码器将接收属于多个类别的参数 [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]。The image encoders that are built into [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] receive parameters that belong to several categories. 下表列出了所有类别以及与每个类别关联的 GUID。The following table lists all the categories and the GUID associated with each category. f2e455dc-09b3-4316-8260-676ada32481c f2e455dc-09b3-4316-8260-676ada32481c 66087055-ad66-4c7c-9a18-38a2310b8337 66087055-ad66-4c7c-9a18-38a2310b8337 e09d739d-ccd4-44ee-8eba-3fbf8be4fc58 e09d739d-ccd4-44ee-8eba-3fbf8be4fc58 edb33bce-0266-4a77-b904-27216099e717 edb33bce-0266-4a77-b904-27216099e717 1d5be4b5-fa4a-452d-9cdd-5db35105e7eb 1d5be4b5-fa4a-452d-9cdd-5db35105e7eb 6d42c53a-229a-4825-8bb7-5c99e2b9a8b8 6d42c53a-229a-4825-8bb7-5c99e2b9a8b8 292266fc-ac40-47bf-8cfc-a85b89a655de 292266fc-ac40-47bf-8cfc-a85b89a655de 3a4e2661-3109-4e56-8536-42c156e7dcfa 3a4e2661-3109-4e56-8536-42c156e7dcfa 8d0eb2d1-a58e-4ea8-aa14-108074b7b6f9 8d0eb2d1-a58e-4ea8-aa14-108074b7b6f9 24d18c76-814a-41a4-bf53-1c219cccf797 24d18c76-814a-41a4-bf53-1c219cccf797 ## Examples 下面的示例从 BMP 文件创建一个 对象。The following example creates a object from a BMP file. 该代码将位图保存为三个 JPEG 文件，每个文件都有不同的质量级别。The code saves the bitmap to three JPEG files, each with a different quality level. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicImagingEndcoder3#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicImagingEndcoder3/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicImagingEndcoder3#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicImagingEndcoder3/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicImagingEndcoder3#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicImagingEndcoder3/VB/form1.vb#3)]

span.span: Represents an object that is initialized with the globally unique identifier for the save flag parameter category.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 向图像编码器传递参数时，该参数将封装在 对象中。When you pass a parameter to an image encoder, the parameter is encapsulated in an object. 对象的一个字段是 GUID，用于指定参数的类别。One of the fields of the object is a GUID that specifies the category of the parameter. 使用 类的静态字段来检索包含所需类别的参数 。Use the static fields of the class to retrieve an that contains parameters of the desired category. 内置于中的图像编码器将接收属于多个类别的参数 [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]。The image encoders that are built into [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] receive parameters that belong to several categories. 下表列出了所有类别以及与每个类别关联的 GUID。The following table lists all the categories and the GUID associated with each category. f2e455dc-09b3-4316-8260-676ada32481c f2e455dc-09b3-4316-8260-676ada32481c 66087055-ad66-4c7c-9a18-38a2310b8337 66087055-ad66-4c7c-9a18-38a2310b8337 e09d739d-ccd4-44ee-8eba-3fbf8be4fc58 e09d739d-ccd4-44ee-8eba-3fbf8be4fc58 edb33bce-0266-4a77-b904-27216099e717 edb33bce-0266-4a77-b904-27216099e717 1d5be4b5-fa4a-452d-9cdd-5db35105e7eb 1d5be4b5-fa4a-452d-9cdd-5db35105e7eb 6d42c53a-229a-4825-8bb7-5c99e2b9a8b8 6d42c53a-229a-4825-8bb7-5c99e2b9a8b8 292266fc-ac40-47bf-8cfc-a85b89a655de 292266fc-ac40-47bf-8cfc-a85b89a655de 3a4e2661-3109-4e56-8536-42c156e7dcfa 3a4e2661-3109-4e56-8536-42c156e7dcfa 8d0eb2d1-a58e-4ea8-aa14-108074b7b6f9 8d0eb2d1-a58e-4ea8-aa14-108074b7b6f9 24d18c76-814a-41a4-bf53-1c219cccf797 24d18c76-814a-41a4-bf53-1c219cccf797 ## Examples 下面的示例创建三个 对象：一个来自 BMP 文件，一个来自 JPEG 文件，另一个来自 PNG 文件。The following example creates three objects: one from a BMP file, one from a JPEG file, and one from a PNG file. 该代码将所有三个图像保存在一个多帧 TIFF 文件中。The code saves all three images in a single, multiple-frame TIFF file. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassingImagingEncoder4#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassingImagingEncoder4/CPP/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassingImagingEncoder4#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassingImagingEncoder4/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassingImagingEncoder4#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassingImagingEncoder4/VB/form1.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 向图像编码器传递参数时，该参数将封装在 对象中。When you pass a parameter to an image encoder, the parameter is encapsulated in an object. 对象的一个字段是 GUID，用于指定参数的类别。One of the fields of the object is a GUID that specifies the category of the parameter. 使用 类的静态字段来检索包含所需类别的参数 。Use the static fields of the class to retrieve an that contains parameters of the desired category. 内置于中的图像编码器将接收属于多个类别的参数 [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]。The image encoders that are built into [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] receive parameters that belong to several categories. 下表列出了所有类别以及与每个类别关联的 GUID。The following table lists all the categories and the GUID associated with each category. f2e455dc-09b3-4316-8260-676ada32481c f2e455dc-09b3-4316-8260-676ada32481c 66087055-ad66-4c7c-9a18-38a2310b8337 66087055-ad66-4c7c-9a18-38a2310b8337 e09d739d-ccd4-44ee-8eba-3fbf8be4fc58 e09d739d-ccd4-44ee-8eba-3fbf8be4fc58 edb33bce-0266-4a77-b904-27216099e717 edb33bce-0266-4a77-b904-27216099e717 1d5be4b5-fa4a-452d-9cdd-5db35105e7eb 1d5be4b5-fa4a-452d-9cdd-5db35105e7eb 6d42c53a-229a-4825-8bb7-5c99e2b9a8b8 6d42c53a-229a-4825-8bb7-5c99e2b9a8b8 292266fc-ac40-47bf-8cfc-a85b89a655de 292266fc-ac40-47bf-8cfc-a85b89a655de 3a4e2661-3109-4e56-8536-42c156e7dcfa 3a4e2661-3109-4e56-8536-42c156e7dcfa 8d0eb2d1-a58e-4ea8-aa14-108074b7b6f9 8d0eb2d1-a58e-4ea8-aa14-108074b7b6f9 24d18c76-814a-41a4-bf53-1c219cccf797 24d18c76-814a-41a4-bf53-1c219cccf797 ## Examples 下面的示例从 JPEG 文件创建一个 对象。The following example creates a object from a JPEG file. 该代码将图像90旋转，并将其保存在单独的 JPEG 文件中。The code rotates the image 90 degrees and saves it in a separate JPEG file. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicImagingEncoderExample5#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicImagingEncoderExample5/CPP/form1.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicImagingEncoderExample5#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicImagingEncoderExample5/CS/form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicImagingEncoderExample5#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicImagingEncoderExample5/VB/form1.vb#5)]
